Pre-Game Insights: France head coach Didier Deschamps will not have three Real Madrid players available for the match due to their Champions League final participation.
Ferland Mendy and Eduardo Camavinga are likely out for recuperation.
Aurelien Tchouameni is injured and may miss the match and subsequent friendly against Canada.
N'Golo Kante is likely to start in midfield.
Adrien Rabiot and Warren Zaire-Emery are expected to start in midfield.
Antoine Griezmann is set to return after missing some matches due to injury.
Ousmane Dembele, Kylian Mbappe, and Olivier Giroud are likely to form the attacking quartet.
Theo Hernandez is likely to start at left-back.
Jules Kounde and Dayot Upamecano are considered for defense with Premier League counterparts.
